Miscellaneous Highlights: The team batting first has won the last four T20I games played at the Wanderers Stadium.

The average first innings score in the last five T20I matches played here has been 179 runs.
Others: South Africa come into this T20 series after losing the ODI series to Pakistan a few days ago.
Without many of their major stars who have left to feature in the T20 League, the Proteas have a point or two to prove as the build-up to the T20 World Cup continues.
The visitors picked up an outstanding series win in the ODIs and now come into the T20s full of confidence.
